mapper.insert: insert into supplement (id, user_id, report_id, description, step, equipment, post_time) values (#{id}, #{user_id}, #{report_id}, #{description}, #{step}, #{equipment}, #{post_time})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, report_id, description, step, equipment, post_time from supplement s where report_id = #{report_id} order by s.post_time DESC
